events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application.
The initial screening call went well, and your technical background matches the roleâ€™s key requirements.
You responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM via video conference.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating solid coding skills and problem-solving ability.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
You completed the HR interview and showed excellent alignment with the company values.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including compensation and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and requested some clarifications about the remote work policy.
You have formally accepted the offer, confirming your start date and enthusiasm to join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to the company portal and introductory training scheduled.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and you are welcomed as a new member of the software engineering team.
